FOOTER.DESCRIPTION: Al Ma'ali Schools aim to achieve the highest level of quality in education to build the necessary skills that enable our students to complete their university education.
FOOTER.COPYRIGHT: ©2026 Al Maaly Gate Schools, All Rights Reserved

PROGRAMS.TITLE: Our Programs
PROGRAMS.DESCRIPTION: We provide world-class educational programs based on the British curriculum, with innovative learning methods and diverse assessment techniques, to enhance students' academic and personal skills and prepare them for a successful future with confidence and efficiency.

PROGRAM_1.TITLE: Examinations and Graduation Certificates
PROGRAM_1.DESCRIPTION: Through an organized examination system and accredited certificates, we ensure fair evaluation that grants the student a certificate opening future horizons with confidence.

PROGRAM_2.TITLE: Continuous Monitoring and Aptitude Tests
PROGRAM_2.DESCRIPTION: Continuous monitoring and aptitude tests ensure accurate measurement of the student's level and support their development with confidence and continuity.

PROGRAM_3.TITLE: Effective and High-Quality Learning Methods
PROGRAM_3.DESCRIPTION: Effective and high-quality learning methods ensure deeper understanding and continuous development for students.

PARTNERS.TITLE: Success Partners
PARTNERS.DESCRIPTION: We are proud to collaborate with innovative companies from around the world. Our partners help us deliver exceptional solutions to our clients.

HERO.TITLE: Welcome to "Maali Gateway School" Explore our New and Unique Learning Style
HERO.SUBTITLE: The best distance learning platform in the Arab world

CURRICULUM.TITLE: Outstanding British Curriculum
CURRICULUM.DESCRIPTION: A distinguished British curriculum with global educational standards, focusing on understanding, critical thinking, and building future skills.

EDUCATION_STYLE.TITLE: New Educational Style
EDUCATION_STYLE.DESCRIPTION: A new educational style that meets learners' needs and offers innovative methods that enhance understanding and make a real difference in the learning experience.

DIGITAL_EDUCATION.TITLE: Modern and Up-to-date Digital Education
DIGITAL_EDUCATION.DESCRIPTION: Modern digital education that keeps pace with development and provides a smart learning experience that integrates modern technologies to enhance understanding and facilitate effective skill acquisition.

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact Us
CONTACT.SUBTITLE: We are always happy to receive your inquiries or complaints

ADDRESS.LABEL: Address
ADDRESS.VALUE: Al Qassim - Buraidah - Al Matar Al Qadeem - Al Wehda Street

ERRORS.MIN_LENGTH_NAME: Name must be at least 3 characters
ERRORS.MIN_LENGTH_MESSAGE: Message must be at least 10 characters

VISION.TITLE: Our Vision
VISION.CONTENT: Al Ma'ali Schools aim to achieve the highest level of quality in education in order to build the necessary skills that enable our students to complete their university education.

MISSION.TITLE: Our Mission
MISSION.CONTENT: Providing educational programs with global foundations and standards of exceptional quality through a British global curriculum within an educational framework characterized by organization, security, positivity, and enrichment.

PHILOSOPHY.TITLE: Our Philosophy
ITEMS: Full awareness that each student has their own unique learning style.

SUB_ITEMS: Learning strategies that focus on activating the student's role.
Different assessment techniques and methods that suit each student's learning style to enhance the learning process.

ITEMS: Creating an atmosphere of expected success to be achieved to a high degree among staff.
Highlighting students' knowledge and skills through the use of logical thinking methods and problem-solving.
Building generations capable of keeping pace with and responding to the changes of the age.
Students' ability to live in other countries, systems, schools, and universities where they have been enriched with the necessary knowledge, skills, and values for this, which is our entrusted goal.
Professional development to instill the idea of lifelong learning.
Belief in the fundamental role of parents in improving and supporting the learning process.

ABOUT.TITLE: About Us
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: Al Ma'ali Schools provide world-class education with an outstanding British curriculum in a safe and positive environment, enhancing thinking skills and problem-solving while keeping pace with modern needs. We believe in a unique learning style for each student and strive to build outstanding and resilient generations, with support for parents and development of educational staff to achieve a distinguished and sustainable learning experience.
